title: Einstein vs Stephen Hawking -Epic Rap Battles of History #7
description: Download on iTunes ► http://erb.fm/buyEinstein Tweet this Vid-ee-oh: http://clicktotweet.com/TpUg9 ► ERB Returns on May 5th, 2014 at http://youtube.com/erb ◄ New ERB merch: http://bit.ly/MNwYxq Hi. My name is Nice Peter, and this is an Epic Rap Battle of History. Your suggestions make these videos possible, so keep them coming. http://instagram.com/erb | http://facebook.com/erb http://twitter.com/ERBofHistory | http://google.com/+ERB http://erb.tumblr.com | http://soundcloud.com/erb http://epicrapbattlesofhistory.com Special thanks to all the cast and crew: ▼ CAST ▼ Albert Einstein: MC Mr Napkins (aka Zach Sherwin) http://www.youtube.com/MCMrNapkins Stephen Hawking: NicePeter http://www.youtube.com/NicePeter http://twitter.com/NicePeter | http://instagram.com/nicepeter Carl Sagan: Lloyd Ahlquist http://www.youtube.com/EpicLLOYD https://twitter.com/theEpicLloyd | http://instagram.com/theepiclloyd ▼ CREW ▼ Executive Producers: Peter Shukoff & Lloyd Ahlquist Directed by: Dave McCary http://www.youtube.com/david Beat Produced by: DJ Naydee & Julian B Track title: The Funeral http://www.beatsplanet.com Director of Photography: Jon Na http://www.youtube.com/jonnamean Assistant Editor: Brandon Perna Special Effects and General Epicness: Blake O'Neal Behind the Scenes: Mike Schroeder http://www.youtube.com/thewarpzone Additional writing and research by: Dante Cimadamore, Phil Haney, Joe Felice Props and costumes: Mary Gutfleisch (yup, the same Mary) Produced by Nikki Fancy for Maker Studios. I hang out here: http://www.youtube.com/nicepeterToo http://www.twitter.com/nicepeter http://www.facebook.com/nicepeter see you soon, -nice peter
